sqlMap.insert: insert into scm.scm_stock_order_detail t (t.id, t.did, t.masterid, t.productid, t.qty, t.factinprice, t.taxrate, t.amt, t.sheetidoriginal, t.remark) values (scm.seq_scm_stock_order_detail.nextval, #did#, #masterid#, #productid#, #qty#, #factinprice#, #taxrate#, #amt#, #sheetidoriginal#, #remark#)
sqlMap.select: select t.masterid, t.productid, p.productname, p.product_code as productcode, p.producttype, p.productspecs, p.productunit, t.factinprice, t.qty, t.taxrate, t.amt, t.remark from scm.scm_stock_order_detail t, product.product_info_jxc p where t.productid = p.id and t.masterid = #value#
